title: BRIEF-India's Automobile Corp Of Goa Reports Drop In Sept Qtr Revenue From Ops By Reuters
text:
BRIEF-India's Automobile Corp Of Goa Reports Drop In Sept Qtr Revenue From Ops

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 20:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Automobile Corp Of Goa Reports Drop In Sept Qtr Revenue From Ops Oct 21 (Reuters) - Automobile Corp Of Goa Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER PROFIT 50.8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 51.8 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 826.2 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.03 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Automobile Corp Of Goa Reports Drop In Sept Qtr Revenue From Ops
